page.title: 09THE ROMSEY GOLF CLUB
page.content: The golf course has 18 holes and they are making it bigger. It is Â£200 to join and Â£100 for your first year. They have a sort of map to help them get through the golf course. It runs through Nightingale Wood. It was opened in 1933 by the Mayor of Southampton. It has an office,shop, and cafe. The golf course backs on to Upton Crescent. There are 18 holes and 38 bunkers. The Romsey golf course used to have 9 holes but they have chopped down some of Nightingale Wood to make it bigger. The golf course has got lots of equipment like spare golf clubs .Some people buy them and some borrow them from the golf office. The entrance to the golf course is on the Romsey Road.
